original_title: What It Takes: Film en Douze Tableaux
overview: An intimate glimpse at songwriting and the balancing of life versus passion as Sarah Shook and her band of seasoned virtuosos, The Disarmers, head into the studio to record their new album Years, and prove they have what it takes to shake up country music.
tagline: A vegan, pansexual, atheist, civil-rights-activist singer/songwriter and her band of seasoned virtuosos walk into a country/western barâ€¦
title: What It Takes: Film en Douze Tableaux
